body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have Parallax Nexus in play
2. Click it to activate its ability. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: computer exiles a card from its hand. The card should appear in Exhiled list, and the number of cards in hand should decrease.

Actual: when Parallax Nexus is clicked, two things happen. First, the message "Computer exiles a card from his or her hand" is placed on the stack. Second, the game prompts "Choose a card from your hand" and waits for me to choose a card. When I do choose a card at this point, a fade counter is removed from Parallax Nexus, but nothing else appears to happen: all the cards remain in my hand, the computer still has the same number of cards it had before, and no cards appear in either Exiled list.

Nothing interesting in game.log:

LOG (P): Put Parallax Nexus onto the battlefield. Parallax Nexus enters the battlefield with 5 fade counters on it.
LOG (P): Remove a charge counter from Parallax Nexus. Play activated ability of Parallax Nexus.
LOG (C): Computer exiles a card from his or her hand. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.37 on Windows 7
